title: Identify white crystalline solid from properites

content.question:
Which of the following could be the identity of a white crystalline solid that exhibits the following properties?

It melts at 320Â°C.

It does not conduct electricity as a solid.

It conducts electricity in an aqueous solution.

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
